abstract: Former Paris Opera Ballet dancer Laurent Hilaire is named to succeed Igor Zelensky as artistic director of Stanislavsky and Nemirovich-Danchenko Moscow Music Theater.

headline.print_headline: New Artistic Director for Stanislavsky Ballet
headline.main: Laurent Hilaire Named Artistic Director of Stanislavsky Ballet

snippet: The former Paris Opera Ballet star dancer will assume that role at the Stanislavsky and Nemirovich-Danchenko Moscow Music Theater on Jan. 1....
lead_paragraph: The former Paris Opera Ballet star dancer will assume that role at the Stanislavsky and Nemirovich-Danchenko Moscow Music Theater on Jan. 1.
